rev.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/68.43.226.222|68.43.226.222]] ([[User talk:68.43.226.222|talk]]) to last version by 62.31.208.21
It wasn't vandalism. I removed it because it's biased rubbish, of which half isn't actually about Seagal.
/* Business ventures */ Added advertising work from the trivia section
/* Trivia */ Killed the Trivia section. It's something which is frowned upon in Featured Articles and it's prone to attract vandals putting in unsourced claims
/* Animal rights work */ Tweaked the mystical dog paragraph a bit.
/* Seagal the artist */ Maybe this is a better title
cleanup and citations have been performed -- nice job everybody!
/* Quotes */ Removed Quote section. Other film star biographies exclude this section also, Wikipedia is not IMDb
/* Trivia */ Got rid of most of the Trivia section, lots of unsourced claims
Couple more sections cleaned up; massive picture reduced. Left quote section; but I'm unsure whether they should be there.
Ced Wikify dates (where month and day both present). Date fragments delinked.
lets narrow it down a bit to reduce controversy; the text of the article already uses this exact wording
Being married to your first wife the entire length of your marriage to your second wife squarely puts you with the bigamists
/* External links */ rv polygamist tag. RTFA - divorcing wife and then remarrying before divorce paperwork is done may technically be polygamy for a short time, but hardly qualifies for category
reverting unjustified deletion, the article clearly explains that he was married to two women at the same time
clean up Typos: correspondant → correspondent, using [[WP:AWB|AWB]]
+ cat lamas; article makes it very clear that he is recognized as such
restored polygamist tag - RTFA - The article says he was married to 2 women AT THE SAME TIME, that makes you a BIGAMIST, which is a type of POLYGAMIST
rv - corrected backward-tagged headings that messed up contents box (I left the prior content edits alone)
Finally got back to cleaning the article up. Did a few more sections and removed a couple of useless bits.
As mildly amusing as that is... rv.
/* External links */ rv - removed polygamist category unsupported by text (affairs don't qualify)

Started to make a lot of it NPOV, but I tried to delete a lot less.
